TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_kawpil, title = kawpil, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/kawpil} }

S.FORM: kawpil 地瓜葉,甘薯葉 u papah nu tuba', taneng mukan tu tademaw atu pahabayay a pabuy. asu' ku ka'nen. Kawpil, u ngangan nu tatayna.
kawpil 地瓜葉,甘薯葉 o papah no toba', taneng mokan to tademaw ato pahabayay a paboy. aso' ko ka'nen. Kawpil, o ngangan no tatayna.
